Rail: Djikstras Algorithm.

22 Dec 2013

Language:

Java

Code:

https://github.com/brent-p/Rail

Uses Djikstras Algorithm to find the quickest route between nodes in an undirected graph. In Rail, nodes are modeled as train stations replicating the Sydney Rail Network with multiple lines between each station.

Hi I'm Brent Parish, a passionate developer from Australia.

You can contact me at: hello@brentparish.com, follow me on twitter or see what I have been up to on github.
